Header: Japanese and UK teams battle it out in 51st World Custard Pie Championship
Content: British team ‘Pie Face’ won the 51st World Custard Pie Championship, beating a sushi team from Japan. The local winners from the host village Coxheath, near Maidstone in Kent, beat 31 other teams from all over the UK, including three from Japan. Japanese runners-up, ‘Do You Like Sushi?’ included members currently living in the UK, but team ‘Kyoto’ flew in from the Japanese city on the island of Honshu especially, as the event is a “very famous festival in Japan” and they wanted to have fun. Other teams included members dressed as the Minions, The Spice Girls and even shower curtains.
